TopicTitle: It's looking like a moderator's account has been compromised.

Articles.Content:
As many of you will have already noticed, strange things have been happening on the forum for a couple of days now. There have been odd thread and post mergings, seemingly random thread moves, and other strangenesses. Unfortunately, not all of it can be undone, but we believe we have put a stop to it and are investigating the origin. We deeply regret the confusion this has caused and the damage to your threads and posts. 

Please do not go looking for someone to blame, and abuse of the person whose account was involved does not make the situation any better and will not be tolerated. 

Once more, we apologize and ask for your patience while we address the situation.
